sys_variable_value.value: Your driver is on their way!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello, Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name!

 

Your driver Trigger➛...➛Name is on their way! Please leave the package at the required pick-up spot. Please expect a phone call if your driver needs help locating it.

Hello, Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name!

 

You have successfully picked up Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name's food donation. Please head back to Meal Connections HQ at Trigger➛...➛Street.

Hello, Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name!

 

You have a food pickup at Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name. The address is Trigger➛...➛Street. Their number for any inquiries is Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Phone.

Please pick the package up before the designated Meal Connections opening time for customer requests.
You have a food pick-up at {{Created_1.current.vendor.company.name}}!

Hello Trigger➛...➛Name!

 

Your driver has successfully picked up the donation from Trigger➛...➛Name. Thank you for helping keep the world a cleaner place by ensuring everyone has the right to eat another meal!

sys_variable_value.value: Your food donation could not be fulfilled.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello, Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name!

 

We sincerely apologized. We could not fulfill the food donation pick-up order at this time. We understand your frustrations and wil be trying our best to scale appropriately. If you would like to still donate this item, please try again tomorrow.
